author: theyyamdancer
title: Prickly Heat Rash Cures
text: These days I am suffering from a prickly heat rash, caused by high summer temperatures and high humidity. Today I found relief by smearing my neck and forehead (the affected areas) with live yoghurt. What do other people do when this extremely itchy and unsightly rash afflicts them ? By the way, about ten days ago, I also had a rash (on my cheeks) which was not prickly heat. It was more like hives, with raised white welts, which I attributed to a spider bite. I cured it with aloe vera and a lot of cool showers and staying in the shade. Today it is around 40 degrees here and I don't have A/C. I am drinking lots of water and not running around. <<Tehzeeb se bolo / Izzat muft milegi >> [Speak (to others) with decency / (you will get) respect for free.]
